Package org.ngi.nodeinputs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnyInput
    Any Input (Any data type).
    AssignmentInput
    Assignment Input - input for any value that can be assigned to a variable.
    BooleanInput
    Basic Boolean Input
    ChildrenInput
    Child Input, accepts any connected number, variable, expression, range or vector.
    ConnVariableInput
    Connected Variable Input.
    ExpressionInput
    Basic Expression Input
    ExpressionInputAny
    Expression Input for MergeExpression - takes normal expressions (number, variables, etc) along with booleans, ranges, etc.
    FragmentSpecInput
    Fragment Spec Input.
    NumberInput
    Basic Number Input
    OperationInput
    Basic Operation Input.
    SetInput
    Set Input, accepts any connected Range or Vector.
    StaticBooleanInput
    Static Boolean Input (No connected values).
    StaticExpressionInput
    Static Expression Input (No connected values).
    StaticFileNameInput
    Static File Name Input (No connected values).
    StaticNumberInput
    Static Number Input (no connected values)
    StaticVariableInput
    Static Variable Input (no connected values).
    VariableInput
    Variable Input.
    VectorInInput
    Vector In Input.
    VectorInput
    Vector Input.
